name: Ten-Tails
title: Deity of Deities
description: The Ten-Tails (十尾, Jūbi) is the combined form of Kaguya Ōtsutsuki and the God Tree, the progenitor of chakra. Its chakra was split into the nine tailed beasts to prevent its rampage.
naturalAbilities: Sensory Type: can sense chakra signatures (range = ROP + Will)
Husk of the Jūbi: grows with absorbed chakra and may awaken to final form
Jūbivenation: can burn God-level chakra to recover HP and restore limbs/statuses
Divine Tree: consuming a pure Ōtsutsuki may transform it into the God Tree
